TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
It’s a rocket

 

i wish something random happens

You suddenly forgot to order your lunch.

I wish no exception stays uncaught.

All exceptions get caught in a fishnet instead.

I wish for more wishes.

Granted. You get a more wishes coupon for your local neighbourhood's genie-in-a-lamp.

I wish for all the old KSP mods to run flawlessly in modern KSP

Granted.  All mods run flawlessly in KSP.  KSP, unfortunately, no longer runs unless you have every mod installed.  The game is now wholly unplayable on any machine due to the competing resources for having so many things running at once.

I wish all existing KSP mods would be updated so that they can run on KSP 1.11, without the need for having every mod installed for KSP to run.

Granted. All existing KSP mods are updated to 1.11 but they immediately expand many times in size and your entire hard drive is filled with KSP mods rendering your PC almost entirely useless.

(Congrats on 333 posts)

I wish for a PC that can run all KSP mods whilst only using 50% system resources.

Granted. That PC though is quite power hungry, causing a massive overload of the power network. The whole country faces a blackout now because of: YOU!

I wish I don't have to make a wish here.

Granted. Let me do that for you.

I wish the Don't Click This becomes unlocked.

It stays locked

 

i wish that at some point starship gets an upgrade

Granted. Instead of launching and blowing up in the air, reducing the company's PR even more, it explodes on the launchpad itself.

I wish for free, clean and renewable, infinite electricity to go along with my extremely power hungry PC.

Granted, but you are forbidden to have access to it.

I wish I could obtain Order of the Trilobyte in the Caveman challenge.

38 minutes ago, Popestar said:

Granted, but you are forbidden to have access to it.

I wish I could obtain Order of the Trilobyte in the Caveman challenge.

Granted. However the subtext compels you to return it within the next minute.

Enjoy your short lived honour.

I wish to have free, unrestricted access to my PC.

Granted. But  Everytime you turn on your PC its life span is shortened by 6 months

I wish I had many Watermelons to eat

Edited January 20, 2021 by Melontime

But it’s on the moon so there is a permanent 2 second latency 

 

I wish the moon had rings

Granted.  You give a ring to Moon Zappa.  Congrats, her husband isn't too happy with you.

I wish Dweezil was my friend.

Granted, but they treat you very bad.

I wish Jebediah Kerman had clones.

Rejected. You can't find two Kerbals looking like twins. They are very individual.

I wish for Kerbals in Skyrim.

Edited January 23, 2021 by kerbiloid

Granted. They are now the final boss and are absolutely unkillable as they build crazy crafts to attack you endlessly.

I wish each time I turn on my PC my lifespan gets extended by 6 months and 1 day.

Edited January 24, 2021 by HyperDraco

Granted. It's loading for 6m1d, and all this time you are in a suspended stand-by mode.

I wish to catch the signal from the dialog.

Granted. You will catch the signal from the dialog in 6m1d.

I wish for my PC's loading time to be instantaneous.

Granted. The PC is instant like coffee. Now it needs milk and sugar to work.

I wish for a magic "+24h" spell.

Granted but it takes effect in 525600 years from.

i wish it would snow

223701242021

Granted. In addition to everything other, it starts snowing.

I wish the snow to melt.

It doesnt and it keeps snowing all over the world until every continent is covered in at least a meter of snow, the avg surface temp is now much below zero

 

i wish the earth spun about 1 second slower

Edited January 25, 2021 by JcoolTheShipbuilder

Granted.  Time speeds up to go 1 second faster, offsetting any difference you may notice.

I wish I was normal.
